availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel Short (Lawrence County, Kentucky, merchant and county court judge )

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky, merchant and county court judge. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth Rice Short in Lawrence County, Kentucky, on September 11, 1845. Merchant in Lawrence County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Lawrence County in 1850. Merchant in Lawrence County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Lawrence County in 1860. County court judge in Lawrence County in 1861. County court judge in Lawrence County in 1862.
